title: This is not fair Riot!

embed.description: Unlimited space to host images, easy to use image uploader, albums, photo hosting, sharing, dynamic image resizing on web and mobile.

body: How can this happen and make the game valid as good?

replies.body:
If you're meaning the 2 players who had gone AFK or disconnected during the match, these things happen. It really sucks when it does, but note that if those players continue to leave games, they'll get noticed by the Leaverbuster system and could receive low-priority queue penalties.

Going forward, be sure to report these players, as it helps us prioritize who we look at. Let me know if you have any questions.
